bwwExcerpt: Christmas has come early to Broadway this year. Previous productions of the family-friendly comedic yuletide fable Elf The Musical, though pleasant enough, have seemed short on the very Christmas spirit—an ineffable sense of animating joy—that the musical is about. Its current revival, however, is another story entirely. To be honest, I wasn’t eager to see Elf get taken down from the shelf yet again. But my grinchiness soon vanished, to be replaced with a big wide grin. For the first time in my experience, this show is really elfin’ good.
showScoreExcerpt:
"...this show is really elfin’ good."

nycTheatreExcerpt: "Broadway needs a little Christmas, right this very minute, and it's a pleasure to take off for a while on Elf's magic ride."
